sentences.english: Jinchangyu Gold Mine experienced four great structural movements. Each movement appeared in the form of folds and fractures.

sentences.english: This valley, also changed his name to a crabapple valley.
sentences.chinese: 这条沟谷，也就改名叫海棠峪了。

sentences.english: The theory has been applied in Dongtongyu Gold Mine in order to control stope pressure.
sentences.chinese: 此理论在东桐峪金矿的采场地压控制中进行了应用。

sentences.english: Huangbaiyu shows that local community participation is crucial.
sentences.chinese: 黄柏峪的经验显示，地方群众的参与是关键。

sentences.english: There are many similarities between Yuerya and Niuxinshan independent porphyry deposits.
